channel.title: building on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in building on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-13
item.description: Microsoft Teams’ Walkie Talkie feature now available to everyone (2 minute read) Walkie-Talkie, a feature that lets Microsoft Teams users turn their mobile and tablet devices into a walkie-talkie that works over cellular data or Wi-Fi, is now available for all users.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-24
item.description: Samsung set to announce new $17 billion advanced chip plant in Texas (3 minute read) Samsung is building a new advanced chip-making plant in Taylor, Texas on a site roughly 1,200 acres in size.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-03-23
item.description: Apple’s HomePod mini reportedly has a secret temperature and humidity sensor (2 minute read) Apple’s HomePod mini smart speaker has a secret temperature and humidity sensor in its casing.
